alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Fayette; Meriwether (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Fayette, northeastern Meriwether and central Coweta Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Madras to Thomas Crossroads to Peachtree City, and moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newnan, Peachtree City, Senoia, Grantville, Luthersville, Moreland, Sharpsburg, Turin, Haralson, East Newnan, Thomas Crossroads and Madras. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
